channel.title: beta on DB Browser for SQLite
channel.description: Recent content in beta on DB Browser for SQLite

item.title: Third beta release of 3.11.0
item.description: The third beta builds for our next major release are ready for testing. Please try them out, and report any weirdness.

item.title: Second beta release of 3.11.0
item.description: The second beta builds for our next major release are ready.

item.title: First beta release of 3.11.0
item.description: The first beta builds for our next major release are ready for testing.

item.title: Second beta release for 3.10.0
item.description: The second beta release for our new 3.10.0 series is ready to download and try.

item.title: First beta release of 3.10.0
item.description: The first beta release of our new 3.10.0 series is ready to download and try.

item.title: Version 3.9.0 beta1 released
item.description: Version 3.9.0 beta1 released, with SQLCipher for strong encryption. [Please try it out](https://github.com/sqlitebrowser/sqlitebrowser/releases/tag/v3.9.0-beta1), and [report any new bugs](https://github.com/sqlitebrowser/sqlitebrowser/issues) you encounter. :smile:
